overview.en: Perlin (PERL) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Perlin has a current supply of 1,033,200,000 with 490,938,908.137 in circulation. The last known price of Perlin is 0.12991151 USD and is down -11.66 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 17 active market(s) with $22,018,867.66 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://perlinx.finance/.
